channel.title: I just need some help please
channel.description:
OK so i downloaded everything i need to make my own private server i use testscape and i got the basic stuff ok so i have 2 questions
1.IF i want to put stuff in for example a NPC that tells whether or not im online or offline i get the codes and put them in the correct locations and when i start my server nothing is there. from what i understand i have to click compile after i edit something then what???
2.and 2 what do i tell people if they want to join my server like i have a no-ip do i tell them supergamerzscape.no-ip.org? or do i tell them the ip i got??? any help will be appreciated[br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 08:03:04 PM[/size][hr]any1
